description: Query all infected host data. This is the API call you want to use to lookup infected host data using an IP address or a network range.
name: infected_query

q_address.description: Query parameter specifying the alphanumeric version of the IPv4 address that will be used to query the database.

q_mask.description: Query parameter specifying a decimal number (between 8 and 32) that represents the network mask portion of the query.
